metadata.description: Solution Location
Name

resources.name: [format('{0}/{1}/{2}', split(format('{0}/{1}', parameters('accountName'), variables('databaseName')), '/')[0], split(format('{0}/{1}', parameters('accountName'), variables('databaseName')), '/')[1], variables('containers')[copyIndex()].name)]
dependsOn: [resourceId('Microsoft.DocumentDB/databaseAccounts/sqlDatabases', split(format('{0}/{1}', parameters('accountName'), variables('databaseName')), '/')[0], split(format('{0}/{1}', parameters('accountName'), variables('databaseName')), '/')[1])]

metadata.description: The Azure region for the resource.
The tags to associate with this resource.
The database roles to assign to the user.
The name of the User Assigned Managed Identity to be used.
The principal (or object) ID of the user to create.
The name of the user to create.
The name of the SQL Database resource.
The name of the SQL Server resource.
Do not set - unique script ID to force the script to run.

properties.arguments: [join(createArray(format('-SqlServerName ''{0}''', parameters('sqlServerName')), format('-SqlDatabaseName ''{0}''', parameters('sqlDatabaseName')), format('-ClientId ''{0}''', parameters('principalId')), format('-DisplayName ''{0}''', parameters('principalName')), format('-DatabaseRoles ''{0}''', join(parameters('databaseRoles'), ','))), ' ')]
